heading: Artist's Website (freelance client)
description: I designed and developed a personal website for a local artist - Hamish Wilson (definitely check him out). The website functions as a web app for the admin, allowing full CRUD operations from the admin portal on all major content pages. This was important for Hamish since he produces art frequently and needs an easy way to keep his website updated. I Integrated a CI/CD pipeline using Docker containers deployed on a VPS

links.description: check it out yourself before its live!

heading: 2D Game Engine
description: Stoff2D is a game engine/library written in C. It provides many game related systems all built from the ground up in pure C and OpenGL. This project improved my understanding and comptecency of data structures and memory

heading: 3D Voxel Engine
description: CGL is a minecraft style voxel engine written in C. This project was a fun way for me to test a matrix/vector math library I was building and also push the limits of batch rendering to cubes out of curiosity of performance.
